text.data: Dragonkeeper: Altair, the homeland of the Holy Dragons... Where the dragons will return to... Always warm... They will go kindly... The land of unchanging memories...[end]D

Dragonkeeper: [character][0x1]... The skies of Orelus... Beneath the clouds, continuing forever, lies another world. Protecting you... The world of people constantly watching over you...
The hole in the sky... The war of the Holy Dragons... It isn't a threat to only the world of Orelus... Beneath the clouds... The dreams of all living things... The strength of their hearts... [character][0x1]... The feeling of reaching beyond the sky... I can feel it throughout my entire body...[end]D
Dragonkeeper: The sky speaks to you... [character][0x1]... Be strong... Don't be worried. Keep believing...[end]H
Hornet let me go to the stern of the ship since a baby was born!! It's because he's the father...[end]
Father...? Hmmm...[end1]T

The first person a dragon baby sees becomes its human father!!
Of course, I had thought you would be the father, [character][0x1]...
But since you're the second person, that makes you the mother...[end]I

I remember when [character][0x1] was just a dragon pup... I was his father...
As I didn't have any children of my own, I took special care of [character][0x1]. Everybody has been calling me the Dragonkeeper ever since...[end][0x2a]
[0x2a]sigh[0x2a] Soon it will be the season for love... It's going to be tough...[end]D
Dragonkeeper: It's a message from the wind... Listen closely, [character][0x1]. Listen to the voice of the wind...[end]I
It says that in Campbell a captain of a dragon squad is waiting for you...[end]
Wait!! Let's go!![end1]
Yes No[end1][0x0]
That's right... Hornet jumped down a bit earlier and told me. Are you going to take off from here?[end]D
Dragonkeeper: Are you going back inside?[end]R
Rush: Let's sneak onto the terrace with [character][0x1]!! Well, you gonna get on?[end]
Get on Feed Pass[end1]T
This is the only way!! Aren't you worried about [character][0x1]?![end]D
Dragonkeeper: That's dangerous... Don't startle them like that...[end]L
Look!! He's not scary... Ouch...!! He bit me...!![end]D
Don't worry!! He's not scary... [character][0x1]'s nice...[end]D
Dragonkeeper: Okay, [character][0x1]. Try calling to him!![end]
Go! Come! Wait![end1]O
Okay then. Be nice to it!![end]G
Give this child a name.[end]Y
You found some Dragon Dung.[end]
The Legend of the Dragon Dung... The one who eats the dung shall open the door to memories of the future...[end]W
Will you taste some?[end]Y
You became a Dragonkeeper.[end]
[character][0x1]...[end]

I am Bahamut...
[character][0x1]... I shall show you memories of the future...[end]
The skies of Orelus... All the lagoons have been lost... The era of humans comes to an end...[end]
The future... I desire to fly... While protecting the lagoons of Orelus... While protecting the humans... [character][0x1]... I shall take you through these skies...[end]T
Two presents are hanging from the end of the statue. They look like they're about to fall. One present is from Hornet, the other is from the crew. Which one will you choose?[end]
Hornet's present The crew's present[end1]T
The other present disappeared into the sky...[end]H
Hornet's message: Congratulations on the revival of Kahna!! [character][0x1], protect the skies of Orelus!! P.S. Don't tell the crew that I gave you a present![end]Y
You got a Scharnhorst [0x28]Ultimate Cross Knight sword[0x29], a Dreadnaught, and a Dillinger.[end]M
Message from the crew: Congratulations on the revival of Kahna. We, the crew are also praying for peace in Orelus. We spent up all of our money. [character][0x1], keep at it!![end]Y
You got a Destroyer, 2 Kaiser Blades, 2 Martial Nays, a Prinzeugen, and an XXX Porno Mag.[end]B
Bikkebakke's dream mushroom patch. No picking! Bikkebakke[end]S
Steal one of Bikkebakke's mushrooms?[end]Y
You got a Poisonous Mushroom.[end]Y
You got a Gross Mushroom.[end]Y
You got a Horrible Mushroom.[end][0x28]
[0x28]Bikkebakke's serious look came to [character][0x1]'s mind...[0x29][end][0x28]
[0x28]Bikkebakke's lonely look came to [character][0x1]'s mind...[0x29][end][0x28]
[0x28]Bikkebakke's innocent eace came to [character][0x1]'s mind...[0x29][end][end]
